spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Parser
spec_data.Description:
This software distribution contains the packages for using Perl5 POD (Plain
Old Documentation). See the "perlpod" and "perlsyn" manual pages from your
Perl5 distribution for more information about POD.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:15:44 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Basic perl modules for handling Plain Old Documentation (POD)
